text: Na'ankure Miko'zama Kegavama Hu'nea Ra Anumzamo'a amanage hie, antahio. Nagra noti kazigati Babiloni kini ne' Nebukatnesana ama mopafima mani'naza kini vahe'mokizmi rankini ne'ki'na avre'na a'nenkeno mika hosiramima'ane, karisiramima'ane, hosi agumpima vano nehu'za ha'ma nehaza vahetamine, tusi'a sondia vahetmima'anena zamavareno esige'za hara eme huzmantegahaze.
